metadata.title: CVE-2020-25741 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: fdctrl_write_data in hw/block/fdc.c in QEMU 5.0.0 has a NULL pointerdereference via a NULL block pointer for the current drive.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
